\

\
此外，百汇还在全球经营着 45 家患者援救中心，为全球患者提供优质全面的卫生保健服务。百汇曾多次囊括包括 SuperBrands 和 亚洲医院管理奖在内的国际卫生管理与服务品质大奖。 
\

\
作为亚洲最大的国际健康保健服务商，百汇拥有庞大的网点和 1500 多名医师。在上海，共有 70 多名经验丰富的医师，设有6 处交通方便的服务网点。可为门诊和住院患者提供各种医疗保健服务。网点遍及上海市中心、 浦东、虹桥和新天地。 
\

\
上海瑞祥门诊部是上海第一家为外国人社区提供优质医疗服务，并继续成为您及您的家庭选择的医疗机构。
\

\
上海瑞祥门诊部拥有富有经验的医疗团队之一。 许文奇医师，柯宝博医师和琳妲医师在上海累计行医20多年。他们都受过广泛的培训，富有评估和治疗各个年龄段儿童的经验。三位医师的孩子都在上海生活，成为了挑战这座“国际化城市”保持儿童健康的老手。

descr_en:
The Punan Hospital International Medical Department consists of the entire 17th floor of the Shanghai Punan Hospital.
\

\
Located in Shanghai’s presitigious Pudong District, between the Lujiazui Financial Zone and the Shanghai 2010 World Expo Site, the Shanghai Punan Hospital was constructed in 1983. Almost 1000 staff members in 28 clinical departments and 8 medical departments treat nearly 1 million patients each year, while nearly 10,000 surgeries are performed. The Shanghai Punan Hospital has been named a Model Unit by the Shanghai Health Department.
\

\
Since the opening of the International Medical Department, patients living in China from the United States, Germany, Australia, Canada, Japan, and 179 other countries and regions have received care in our hospital. We are also designated as an official “compatriot” hospital of Taiwan.
\

\
During 2011, 350 inpatients were hospitalized at the International Medical Department of our hospital. During that time, we help 8,660 people who came to spend time with their loved ones. We also helped make arrangements to escort 26 people home. We are highly experienced with health insurance companies worldwide, and we are listed as a formal hospital for more than 40 companies.
\

\
The Shanghai Punan Hospital boasts some of China’s most advanced medical equipment, including : two sets of neurosurgery navigation equipment, multiple surgical microscopes, various neuroendoscopy and stereotactic treatment instruments, digital X-ray imaging, CT, high-end ultrasound, DSA, digital mammography systems, to name just a few.
\

\
In addition, we have been leaders in the creation and implementation of an ultra-modern and comprehensive computer management system which accesses and cross-refernces data stored in the Hospital Information System (HIS), the Administrative Office System (OA), the Medical Image Storage and Transmission System (PACS), the Laboratory Information System (LIS), and allows doctors to access the information via Mobile Workstations. This information is then also made available to the Regional Health Information System, which then makes your data available to medical professionals in other facilities, keeping you safe wherever you go.

Values Shanghai East International Medical Center strive to be the best healthcare provider by offering safe, evidence-based and patient-oriented practices through its global team of professionals.
